text: On a normal day, this is only an Oil Leak. Today, it's another graveyard for our enemies.
If our enemies want to see this city burn, they'll burn first.
Watching from above the Garrison Headquarters, this tower will make any intruder pay dearly.
A creation of the brightest minds from the University of Magic.
Mortars straight out of the forges, ready to make it rain shells.
The great forges of Nuln re-route their smoke and polution to the streets of Faulestadt, poisoning the air for anyone still there.
Fully oiled and ready to burn.
The best weapons and armours the engineers of Nuln can offer.
If you need something to defend yourself and you're not part of the garrison, here's where you get it.
The Great Palace of Nuln, a symbol of the city... which must never fall.
If we can get sick and die of this smog, our enemies can too.
The mages at the University of Magic may not be as famous as the ones from other cities, but sure they can burn you down to a crisp if you tell them so.
